abstract: A reader that provides access to an attachment’s data.
overview:
## Overview

To access the attachment’s data, get a data reader from the attachment store.

You can then asynchronously access the whole data object.

Alternatively, you can access the file’s contents as an asynchronous sequence of bytes.

items.description: An asynchronous sequence that provides the attachment’s data.
items.name: bytes

items.description: An object you can use to track the progress while reading an attachment’s data.
items.name: progress

items.description: An attachment object that represents the file from which the reader is reading.
items.name: attachment

items.description: A file that is attached to a sample in the HealthKit store.
items.name: HKAttachment

items.description: The access point for attachments associated with samples in the HealthKit store.
items.name: HKAttachmentStore

title: HKAttachmentDataReader
